æ‰€ä»¥å¯¹äºå½“å‰çš„æ•°,æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å­˜ä¸€ä¸‹æ¯ä¸€ä½èƒ½åˆ’åˆ†å‡ºå¤šå°‘ \(1\)

ç„¶åæŒ‰ç…§åˆ’åˆ†å‡º \(1\) çš„ä¸ªæ•°ä»å°åˆ°å¤§æ’ä¸€ä¸‹åº

å¦‚æœå½“å‰çš„ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ä¸º \(0\),é‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬å°±ä»å½“å‰è¿™ä¸€ä½å¼€å§‹ä¸€ç›´åˆ°æœ€åéƒ½å‡å»å½“å‰çš„ä¸ªæ•°

è¿™æ ·åˆ°æœ€åï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰ä½ä¸Šçš„æ•°é‡éƒ½ä¼šå˜æˆ \(0\)

#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
const int maxn=15;
struct asd{
        int num,id;
        asd(){}
        asd(int aa,int bb){
                num=aa,id=bb;
        }
}b[maxn];
bool cmp(asd aa,asd bb){
        return aa.num<bb.num;
}
int n,cnt,sta[maxn],top;
int main(){
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int cs=1;
        while(n){
                b[++cnt]=asd(n%10,cs);
                n/=10;
                cs*=10;
        }
        std::sort(b+1,b+1+cnt,cmp);
        int head=1;
        while(head<=cnt){
                int now=0;
                while(b[head].num==0 && head<=cnt) head++;
                for(int i=head+1;i<=cnt;i++){
                        now+=b[i].id;
                        b[i].num-=b[head].num;
                }
                now+=b[head].id;
                for(int i=1;i<=b[head].num;i++){
                        sta[++top]=now;
                }
                b[head].num=0;
        }
        printf("%d\n",top);
        for(int i=1;i<=top;i++){
                printf("%d ",sta[i]);
        }
        printf("\n");
        return 0;
}

/**è®¤è¯ç®¡ç†å™¨

public class CurrentSystemAuthenticator {
    private DefaultSecurityManager securityManager;
    public CurrentSystemAuthenticator() {
        //åˆ›å»ºå®‰å…¨ç®¡ç†å™¨
        securityManager = new DefaultSecurityManager();

        //è®¾ç½®è‡ªå®šä¹‰realm
        this.securityManager.setRealm(new MySqlRealm());

        //å°†å®‰å…¨ç®¡ç†å™¨è®¾ç½®åˆ°å®‰å…¨å·¥å…·ç±»ä¸­
        SecurityUtils.setSecurityManager(securityManager);

    }

    public void authenticate(String username,String password){
        //è·å–å½“å‰ç™»å½•ä¸»é¢˜
        Subject subject = SecurityUtils.getSubject();

        //ç”Ÿæˆtoeken
        UsernamePasswordToken token = new UsernamePasswordToken(username, password);

        //è¿›è¡Œè®¤è¯
        try {
            subject.login(token);
        }catch (UnknownAccountException | IncorrectCredentialsException e) {
            System.out.println("ç”¨æˆ·åæˆ–å¯†ç ä¸æ­£ç¡®");
        }


        //æ‰“å°è®¤è¯çŠ¶æ€
        if (subject.isAuthenticated()){
            System.out.println(token.getPrincipal()+" è®¤è¯é€šè¿‡ï¼");
        }else {
            System.out.println(token.getPrincipal()+" è®¤è¯æœªé€šè¿‡ï¼");
        }


    }
}

class Person:

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http;
using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc;
using Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore;
using App001.Models;
namespace App001.Controllers
{
    [Route("api/[controller]")]
    [ApiController]
    public class TodosController : ControllerBase
    {
        private readonly TodoContext context;
        public TodosController(TodoContext context)
        {
            this.context = context;
        }
        /// <summary>
        /// è·å–æ‰€æœ‰å¾…åŠäº‹é¡¹
        /// </summary>
        /// <returns></returns>
        [HttpGet]
        public async Task<ActionResult<IEnumerable<Todo>>> GetTodos()
        {
            return await context.Todo.ToListAsync();
        }
        /// <summary>
        /// æŒ‰IDè·å–é¡¹
        /// </summary>
        /// <param name="id"></param>
        /// <returns></returns>
        [HttpGet("{id}")]
        public async Task<ActionResult<Todo>> GetTodo(Guid id)
        {
            var todo = await context.Todo.FindAsync(id);
            if (todo == null)
            {
                return NotFound();
            }
            return todo;
        }
        /// <summary>
        /// æ·»åŠ æ–°é¡¹
        /// </summary>
        /// <param name="todo"></param>
        /// <returns></returns>
        [HttpPost]
        public async Task<ActionResult<Todo>> PostTodo(Todo todo)
        {
            todo.Id = Guid.NewGuid();
            context.Todo.Add(todo);
            await context.SaveChangesAsync();
            return CreatedAtAction("GetTodo", new { id = todo.Id }, todo);
        }
        /// <summary>
        /// æ›´æ–°ç°æœ‰é¡¹
        /// </summary>
        /// <param name="id"></param>
        /// <param name="todo"></param>
        /// <returns></returns>
        [HttpPut("{id}")]
        public async Task<ActionResult<Todo>> PutTodo(Guid id, Todo todo)
        {
            var oldTodo = await context.Todo.FindAsync(id);
            oldTodo.Name = todo.Name;
            context.Entry(oldTodo).State = EntityState.Modified;
            await context.SaveChangesAsync();
            return oldTodo;
        }
        /// <summary>
        /// åˆ é™¤é¡¹
        /// </summary>
        /// <param name="id"></param>
        /// <returns></returns>
        [HttpDelete("{id}")]
        public async Task<ActionResult<Todo>> DeleteTodo(Guid id)
        {
            var todo = await context.Todo.FindAsync(id);
            if (todo == null)
            {
                return NotFound();
            }
            context.Todo.Remove(todo);
            await context.SaveChangesAsync();
            return todo;
        }
    }
}

public class SeedData
{
    public static void InitData(IApplicationBuilder serviceProvider)
    {
        Console.WriteLine("å¼€å§‹åˆ›å»ºåˆå§‹åŒ–æ•°æ®...");
        using (var scope = serviceProvider.ApplicationServices.CreateScope())
        {
            scope.ServiceProvider.GetRequiredService<PersistedGrantDbContext>().Database.Migrate();
            {
                var context = scope.ServiceProvider.GetRequiredService<ConfigurationDbContext>();
                context.Database.Migrate();
                EnsureSeedData(context);
            }
        }
        Console.WriteLine("åˆå§‹åŒ–æ•°æ®åˆ›å»ºå®Œæˆ.");
    }

    private static void EnsureSeedData(ConfigurationDbContext context)
    {
        if (!context.Clients.Any())
        {
            Console.WriteLine("Clients æ­£åœ¨åˆå§‹åŒ–");
            foreach (var client in InMemoryConfig.GetClients())
            {
                context.Clients.Add(client.ToEntity());
            }
            context.SaveChanges();
        }

        if (!context.IdentityResources.Any())
        {
            Console.WriteLine("IdentityResources æ­£åœ¨åˆå§‹åŒ–");
            foreach (var resource in InMemoryConfig.GetIdentityResources())
            {
                context.IdentityResources.Add(resource.ToEntity());
            }
            context.SaveChanges();
        }

        if (!context.ApiResources.Any())
        {
            Console.WriteLine("ApiResources æ­£åœ¨åˆå§‹åŒ–");
            foreach (var resource in InMemoryConfig.GetApiResources())
            {
                context.ApiResources.Add(resource.ToEntity());
            }
            context.SaveChanges();
        }

        if (!context.ApiScopes.Any())
        {
            Console.WriteLine("ApiScopes æ­£åœ¨åˆå§‹åŒ–");
            foreach (var resource in InMemoryConfig.GetApiScopes())
            {
                context.ApiScopes.Add(resource.ToEntity());
            }
            context.SaveChanges();
        }
    }
}
